title: (x) Burlesque of North America - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ Alternates {David H, Eric W}
content:
it’s everywhere nowadays, and i wouldn’t be surprised if someone else already got an ID on it, but i can’t find it -

[http://www.burlesquedesign.com/index/index\_r18\_c6.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194014/http:/www.burlesquedesign.com/index/index_r18_c6.jpg "http://www.burlesquedesign.com/index/index\_r18\_c6.jpg")

 [‹ (x) Dawg-Tail logo - (similar to) "Ernie"hold "collective body of inhabitants, incorporated and governed by a mayor" {Dav}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194014/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15483 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Heinrich Böll Stiftung - (similar to) Gravur Condensed {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194014/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15529 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bwhitla

comments.content: wow, that must’ve been a draw.

A few days ago, someone mentioned a site with many of these Avant Garde ligatures [http://www.keithtam.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194014/http:/www.keithtam.net/ "http://www.keithtam.net/") that was pretty helpful.
